name: WITCHTALE
description:
Description: 

The young witch has to venture deep into Spiky Forest, Slime Swamp, and Lunar Pond to collect three precious materials that will make the best birthday gift in the world for her grandma's 500th birthday. The player is tasked to use the young witch's magic abilities cleverly to navigate through the beautiful yet dangerous forest.

Pentacle Studio:

Franklin Kong, Kevin Pu, Tom Wang, Xinyi Liu, Yingying Zhu

Freelancer:

Musa Haydar (Music), Madison Lee (Voice Acting), Jonathan Cox (Voice Acting)
